Package io.reinert.requestor.auth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Auth
    Abstraction for HTTP Authentication/Authorization methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicAuth
    HTTP Basic Authentication implementation.
    CorsAuth
    This class sets withCredentials to true to enable CORS authentication.
    DigestAuth
    HTTP Digest Authentication implementation.
    OAuth2Base
    OAuth2 authentication.
    OAuth2ByHeader
    OAuth2 authentication through the Authorization Request Header Field method.
    OAuth2ByQueryParam
    OAuth2 authentication through the URI Query Parameter method.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthException
    Exception for authentication issues.
